snippet: The nation plans to use the market, expected to be introduced in 2016, to slow its rapid growth in climate-changing emissions.
abstract: China plans to introduce its national market for carbon permit trading in 2016; nation accounts for nearly 30 percent of global greenhouse gas emissions and it plans to use carbon market to slow its rapid growth in climate-changing emissions.
lead_paragraph: The nation plans to use the market, expected to be introduced in 2016, to slow its rapid growth in climate-changing emissions.

headline.main: China Plans a Market for Carbon Permits
